data.text:
Let's see, recyclable trash for tomorrow…… which 
magazines was I gonna throw away? This one, and 
I'll keep the hot spring one…… and this one――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Let's see, recyclable trash for tomorrow…… which 
󠁿magazines was I gonna throw away? This one, and 
󠁿I'll keep the hot spring one…… and this one――

data.text: ――A college pamphlet, huh?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿――A college pamphlet, huh?

data.text: This one…… I guess…… I'll hold on to it for now.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿This one…… I guess…… I'll hold on to it for now.

data.text:
Hishi Miracle's training for the Selection 
Race was proceeding smoothly.
data.processed:
󠁿Hishi Miracle's training for the Selection 
󠁿Race was proceeding smoothly.

data.text:
Alright, finished stretching. 
And then, I'll take it easy today too――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Alright, finished stretching. 
󠁿And then, I'll take it easy today too――

data.text:
That surprised me…… 
Ahh～, I see. Top Road-chan is gonna run, huh?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿That surprised me…… 
󠁿Ahh～, I see. Top Road-chan is gonna run, huh?

data.text:
A girl that debuted slightly before, and was popular inside 
and outside of the academy. A rising star of the next gen, 
Narita Top Road, was on the course.
data.processed:
󠁿A girl that debuted slightly before, and was popular inside 
󠁿and outside of the academy. A rising star of the next gen, 
󠁿Narita Top Road, was on the course.

data.text:
Yep～, she's so cool today too! We're on different levels, 
huh～? We're the same grade so sometimes we talk, but 
it's like she's from another world.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Yep～, she's so cool today too! We're on different levels, 
󠁿huh～? We're the same grade so sometimes we talk, but 
󠁿it's like she's from another world.

data.text:
I do～. After all, Top Road-chan's 
fans all expect her to 『Win in the 
Twinkle Series』, don't they?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿I do～. After all, Top Road-chan's 
󠁿fans all expect her to 『Win in the 
󠁿Twinkle Series』, don't they?

data.text:
Don't you think that's a really amazing thing? 
Besides, debuts aren't an automatic thing, you know?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Don't you think that's a really amazing thing? 
󠁿Besides, debuts aren't an automatic thing, you know?

data.text:
There are girls that go to more rural areas, and 
girls who go in to higher education. Actually, 
that's probably what most people do――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿There are girls that go to more rural areas, and 
󠁿girls who go in to higher education. Actually, 
󠁿that's probably what most people do――

data.text:
Of course, even me, and the other girls with 
me…… how should I put it――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Of course, even me, and the other girls with 
󠁿me…… how should I put it――

data.text:
『Can I even handle a race?』 rather than…… 『Can I win?』. 
That's what we're more worried about.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿『Can I even handle a race?』 rather than…… 『Can I win?』. 
󠁿That's what we're more worried about.

data.text:
That's why, girls like Top Road-chan…… Kris S-chan and Gimlet-chan. 
Girls whose goals are 『To Win』――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, girls like Top Road-chan…… Kris S-chan and Gimlet-chan. 
󠁿Girls whose goals are 『To Win』――

data.text:
……it's like, they seem like people from a different 
world from us～…… That's how it feels to us.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿……it's like, they seem like people from a different 
󠁿world from us～…… That's how it feels to us.

data.text:
……and that's why I haven't even 
debuted up until now～. Ding, ding♪
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿……and that's why I haven't even 
󠁿debuted up until now～. Ding, ding♪

data.text:
『If she doesn't win a Selection Race, there won't be 
a contract』…… that was the condition she proposed, 
so her debut could be a fresh start.
data.processed:
󠁿『If she doesn't win a Selection Race, there won't be 
󠁿a contract』…… that was the condition she proposed, 
󠁿so her debut could be a fresh start.

data.text:
I could understand her trepidation in stepping 
in to the post-debut world. However, the Uma 
Musume named Hishi Miracle――
data.processed:
󠁿I could understand her trepidation in stepping 
󠁿in to the post-debut world. However, the Uma 
󠁿Musume named Hishi Miracle――

data.text:
When I told her 『You can win』, 
she definitely seemed to be happy.
data.processed:
󠁿When I told her 『You can win』, 
󠁿she definitely seemed to be happy.

data.text:
Excuse me, something urgent came up so the person I 
was going to do pace training with couldn't make it…… 
Is there anyone that will run with me?
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Excuse me, something urgent came up so the person I 
󠁿was going to do pace training with couldn't make it…… 
󠁿Is there anyone that will run with me?

data.text:
So pace training with Top Road-chan……? 
I-it's a good chance to run with someone 
strong. Why don't you go?
data.name: Cheerful Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿So pace training with Top Road-chan……? 
󠁿I-it's a good chance to run with someone 
󠁿strong. Why don't you go?

data.text:
No, no way no way no way! She's already won several major 
races, you know!? Running with people who haven't debuted 
like us won't even be a challenge……!
data.name: Cynical Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿No, no way no way no way! She's already won several major 
󠁿races, you know!? Running with people who haven't debuted 
󠁿like us won't even be a challenge……!

data.text:
I wonder who Top Road-chan's 
going to run with, huh～?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿I wonder who Top Road-chan's 
󠁿going to run with, huh～?

data.text:
It was clear that she thought she wouldn't be lining up 
down there, that's the kind of girl Hishi Miracle was.

choices.text: Excuse me!! She'll run with you!!

data.processed:
󠁿It was clear that she thought she wouldn't be lining up 
󠁿down there, that's the kind of girl Hishi Miracle was.

data.text: ……Eh?
data.name: Hishi Miracle

data.text:
Now that I knew about her efforts, and her 
worries―― It had felt a little unsatisfying.
data.processed:
󠁿Now that I knew about her efforts, and her 
󠁿worries―― It had felt a little unsatisfying.

data.text:
Mirako-chan, thanks a lot! It's been a while 
since we've run together, hasn't it?!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Mirako-chan, thanks a lot! It's been a while 
󠁿since we've run together, hasn't it?!

data.text:
Ah, ahaha. I might be lacking in strength, 
but looking forward to it～……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, ahaha. I might be lacking in strength, 
󠁿but looking forward to it～……

data.text:
Wait a minute, Trainer-san……! Why are you making 
me do something that'll be super embarrassing……!?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Wait a minute, Trainer-san……! Why are you making 
󠁿me do something that'll be super embarrassing……!?

data.text: W-what's your basis for that……!?
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: You're both in the same world
You're both in the same world

data.processed: 󠁿W-what's your basis for that……!?

data.text: ……There's no way that's true, right～……?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿……There's no way that's true, right～……?

data.text:
I want Hishi Miracle to realize her own 
strength. But, if she doesn't get good 
results here, things won't progress.
data.processed:
󠁿I want Hishi Miracle to realize her own 
󠁿strength. But, if she doesn't get good 
󠁿results here, things won't progress.

data.text:
In order to decrease the time it took her to get her engine 
going, I had a secret plan. With this, for sure――!
data.processed:
󠁿In order to decrease the time it took her to get her engine 
󠁿going, I had a secret plan. With this, for sure――!

data.text:
Huuuuh……!? 
B-but I just started running though～!?
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: Go! Do your best! You can do it!

data.processed:
󠁿Huuuuh……!? 
󠁿B-but I just started running though～!?

data.text:
(No way, no way, increasing my pace now would just lead to 
me being exhausted and being the punchline……)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(No way, no way, increasing my pace now would just lead to 
󠁿me being exhausted and being the punchline……)

data.text: (No, it's impossible……)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿(No, it's impossible……)

data.text: (That's embarrassing……)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿(That's embarrassing……)

data.text: You-…… you're going that far～……!?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿You-…… you're going that far～……!?

data.text:
The secret plan…… that's right. It was to heap 
praise on top of her. And, in short――
data.processed:
󠁿The secret plan…… that's right. It was to heap 
󠁿praise on top of her. And, in short――

data.text: Haaa, haaa……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Haaa, haaa……

data.text: (A-again……!?)
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: Hishi Miracle, you can do it!!

data.processed: 󠁿(A-again……!?)

data.text: (Aw～ geez, guess I don't have a choice～……!!)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿(Aw～ geez, guess I don't have a choice～……!!)

data.text:
(Huh, it's going surprisingly well…… 
no wait, that can't be right～!)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(Huh, it's going surprisingly well…… 
󠁿no wait, that can't be right～!)

data.text:
Haaa…… Haaa…… huh……? 
It was kind of…… a close match……?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Haaa…… Haaa…… huh……? 
󠁿It was kind of…… a close match……?

data.text:
Good work out there, it was good 
training, wasn't it!? Like I thought, 
Mirako-chan is strong!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿Good work out there, it was good 
󠁿training, wasn't it!? Like I thought, 
󠁿Mirako-chan is strong!

data.text: Wha-…… ah, no～, I'm not sure about that……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Wha-…… ah, no～, I'm not sure about that……

data.text:
But you are! Really, it was good training. 
I'm looking forward to next time too!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
󠁿But you are! Really, it was good training. 
󠁿I'm looking forward to next time too!

choices.text: That's right! Hishi Miracle is strong!!

data.text:
Wha- you scared me!? ……No way～…… Today I 
just happened to get swept up in your plan, I don't 
think next time will go so well……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Wha- you scared me!? ……No way～…… Today I 
󠁿just happened to get swept up in your plan, I don't 
󠁿think next time will go so well……

data.text:
Hishi Miracle was being humble…… 
but it was thanks to her own strength 
that she had gotten this far.

choices.text: It was 『The results of your efforts』

data.processed:
󠁿Hishi Miracle was being humble…… 
󠁿but it was thanks to her own strength 
󠁿that she had gotten this far.

data.text:
But, it's not like I was working 
all that hard though……
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: That's not true! You worked hard!

data.processed:
󠁿But, it's not like I was working 
󠁿all that hard though……

data.text:
You really think so……? 
Ah～! No～ look～ you're doing it again～!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿You really think so……? 
󠁿Ah～! No～ look～ you're doing it again～!

data.text:
In the training just now too, Trainer-san was 
being so persistent that it motivated me. 
Without that much motivation――
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: Then I'll do it every time!
Then I'll do it every time!

data.processed:
󠁿In the training just now too, Trainer-san was 
󠁿being so persistent that it motivated me. 
󠁿Without that much motivation――

data.text:
Eeeeh～……? But, I'm not the kind of Uma Musume 
who should be receiving that――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Eeeeh～……? But, I'm not the kind of Uma Musume 
󠁿who should be receiving that――

data.text:
I shook my head. 
At least, to me, in the Twinkle Series――
data.processed:
󠁿I shook my head. 
󠁿At least, to me, in the Twinkle Series――

data.text: ……Mmmmmm.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿……Mmmmmm.

data.text: ……I see. ……so you really think that, huh?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿……I see. ……so you really think that, huh?
